channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AR

item.title: Report X-2023100162
item.description:
Report X-2023100162

  • City: FORT SMITH

  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

DescribePack: The plastic bottle has a small hole or puncture in the bottom maybe due to defect in plastic DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was place in hazmat tote
